description: Connacht score six tries to Benetton's three as the Irish province secure a 38-30 win over their Italian opponents in the United Rugby Championship game in Galway.
title: Connacht see off Benetton in nine-try thriller
title_page: United Rugby Championship: Connacht see off Benetton in nine-try thriller - BBC Sport
